Name: Stella Rosa Black Semi-Sweet Red Wine 750 ml

Name: Juggernaut Hillside Cabernet
Details: Overcoming challenges builds character. Our grapes are grown in challenging conditions, where true grit and determination yield spectacular results. These conditions stress the vines, resulting in the production of a fraction of the fruit of most vineyards. The harsh environment causes the vines to struggle, yielding fewer clusters and smaller berry size. The result is berries that are loaded with rich, ripe, intensely concentrated flavors and complexity.
